medical_history.chief_complaint: Lower abdominal pain and RUQ tenderness.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient states his pain began the day before yesterday with associated loss of appetite. His abdominal pain has been an ongoing issue requiring hospitalization for LLQ abdominal pain, emesis, diarrhea, and elevated LFTs. On presentation, the patient continues to complain of abdominal pain, specifically in the lower abdomen, and intermittent pain with defecation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, complete heart block s/p pacemaker placement, prostate cancer s/p prostatectomy, seizure disorder, vascular dementia, memory loss, venous stasis, glaucoma, polyneuropathy, appendectomy, colonic polyps, gastroesophageal reflux.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents deceased with no known medical problems. Brother with some type of pancreas problem.
